Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to My Solar Monitor! This Alexa skill provides you with seamless voice control and real-time alerts for your solar power system. My Solar Monitor is designed to integrate with our monitoring portal, offering you an easy way to keep track of your solar energy production, battery status, and energy import/export data using simple voice commands. Here’s everything you need to know to get started.

Prerequisites and Requirements:

Hardware Requirements:

My Solar Monitor requires compatible inverter hardware to function. Ensure you have the necessary equipment installed.
Supported inverters can be found on our official website.
Account Requirements:

You must have an active account on our web monitoring portal. If you don’t have an account yet, please sign up here.
Supported Devices:

My Solar Monitor is compatible with all Alexa-enabled devices, including Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Echo Show, and other Alexa-compatible speakers.
Access Limitations:

The skill is currently available for users in regions where our monitoring services are supported. Check our website for a list of supported regions.
Getting Started:

Link Your Account:

To begin using My Solar Monitor, you need to link your web monitoring account with Alexa.
Open the Alexa app on your mobile device.
Navigate to "Skills & Games" and search for "My Solar Monitor."
Enable the skill and follow the on-screen instructions to link your account.
Invoking the Skill:

Use the invocation name to interact with the skill. Simply say, “Alexa, open Solar Monitoring.”
Core Features:

Check Alerts:

Stay informed about your solar system’s status with real-time alerts.
Example command: “Alexa, check alerts.”
Check Battery State of Charge (SOC):

Monitor your battery’s state of charge to ensure optimal performance.
Example command: “Alexa, check battery SOC.”
Current Generation:

Get updates on your solar energy generation in real-time.
Example command: “Alexa, what’s the current generation?”
Daily Import and Export Data:

Track the total energy imported and exported by your system for the day.
Example command: “Alexa, what is the total import and export for today?”
Additional Information:

Future Features:
We are continuously working on adding more features to enhance your experience. Stay tuned for updates!
Disclaimer:

My Solar Monitor is not sponsored or endorsed by Amazon.
We do not imply any affiliation with third-party companies or brands without official authorization.
If our skill makes use of any trademarks, intellectual property, or brands, we have obtained the necessary permissions and provide proof of rights in the Testing Instructions field.
Privacy and Data Security:

Your privacy is important to us. My Solar Monitor adheres to strict data protection policies to ensure your information is secure.
For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
Start monitoring your solar power system effortlessly with My Solar Monitor. For any assistance or support, please visit our Help Center.
